snippet.title: Riddle Tower Trailer 2
snippet.description:
🕹️ Riddle Tower Official Trailer 2🕹️

✨ Steam page is live! ✨
👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/3044540/Riddle_Tower

🌟 Wishlist the game to show your love and be ready for the full Windows version release on July 22nd! 🌟

📢 Join our community:

Discord - https://discord.com/invite/azAVch3A
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/TheRIddleTower
Twitter - https://x.com/riddle_tower
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/riddletower/
